StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Custom Microarray Developmental Disabilities Clinical Dataset

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The dataset used for the analyses described in this manuscript was obtained from the database of Genotype and Phenotype (dbGaP) found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap [accession number phs xxxxxx]. Samples and associated data for the study "Custom Microarray Developmental Disabilities Clinical Dataset" were provided by Charles Hensel, Ph.D., Karen Ho, Ph.D., and Rena Vanzo, M.S.at Lineagen, Inc. The samples and data generated for this study are described in detail in Hensel et al. [PLoS Currents: Evidence in Genomic Tests (citation)].
Policy.ic_specific_access_term:
There are three consent groups associated with this project: General Research Use (GRU); Health/Medical/Biomedical (HMB); and, Disease-Specific. All three require local IRB approval. All requestors and data users must provide a local Institutional Review Board (IRB) letter from their respective institution approving conduct of the proposed research project. The IRB letter must explicitly reference the use of the "Custom Microarray Developmental Disabilities Clinical Dataset" dataset.
All three consent groups for the “Custom Microarray Developmental Disabilities Clinical Dataset” are restricted to use by investigators at not-for-profit organizations.
The HMB and Disease-Specific consent groups of the dataset entitled “Custom Microarray Developmental Disabilities Clinical Dataset” are restricted to “Genetic Studies Only” on developmental disabilities and related conditions. Use of these data to conduct non-genetic research is prohibited. It is also allowable for these two consent groups to be used to develop methods/software/algorithms for genetic analysis. The annual progress report should cite work done that relates specifically to this dataset [“Custom Microarray Developmental Disabilities Clinical Dataset”] and not just a generic report for a series of datasets that may also have been requested at the same time.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
